name: My Apocalypse
description:
What is this game about?

My Apocalypse is a survival horror / action game based around a story of a father. His wife and child killed by bandits. He is angry. He is seeking for revenge thus he finds a way to battle with bandits with the help of zombies. Disguising among zombies with their rotten flesh, killing bandits. It's only one level which is Episode - 0

Controls

  • Menu Scene
    • ESC - Quit Game
  • Game Scene
    • ESC - Go Main Menu
    • P - Pause
    • R - Restart
    • E - Press near by dead zombie to camouflage

Our PURA Gam Jam submission.

Theme: Collaboration

Duration: 48 hours.

Date: 25-27 Dec 2020
